nodeKeys.name: CLOSURE_BINDING_ID
nodeKeys.comment: Identifier which uniquely describes a CLOSURE_BINDING. This property is used to match captured LOCAL nodes with the corresponding CLOSURE_BINDING nodes

nodeKeys.name: CLOSURE_ORIGINAL_NAME
nodeKeys.comment: The original name of the (potentially mangled) captured variable

nodeTypes.name: CLOSURE_BINDING
nodeTypes.comment: Represents the binding of a LOCAL or METHOD_PARAMETER_IN into the closure of a method

edgeTypes.name: CAPTURE
edgeTypes.comment: Represents the capturing of a variable into a closure
